title: Mapping the Sacred Journey
name: Mapping the Sacred Journey
description:
A Map by Aristaeus

My sacred journey west inspired by Walt Whitman, Jack Kerouac, William Least Heat Moon, Robert M. Pirsig, Patty Griffin, Natalie Merchant, Leslie Marmon Silko, and my friends and family
